item.title: Apache Web Server Log Parsing Tool Using Python (Enhanced Version)
item.description: As part of this DevOps project, we showcase how Python scripting can be used to parse Apache access logs in real-world scenarios. Two years ago, I posted a ðŸ”— [Shell Script](https://github.com/NITHIN-JOHN-GEORGE/apache_log_parser) for performing this operation. The following is a Python implementation of the same
